p: Territory of Washington County of Spokane} W.D. Coyle being first duly sowrn at oath says that he is the identified person named in the foregoing petition as petitioner. That he knows the contents of said petition and that the facts therein stated are true. Wilson D. Coyle Subscribed and sworn to before me this third day of July 1885 H.W. Knox Notary Public To the clerk of the District Court Let the writ issue according to W Coyle of the petition responsible before me at chambers in the city of Spokane Halls at one o'clock P.M. this day July 3 1885 George Turner Judge
